function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {

    return style;
}

}

var User = '';
var Title = '';

var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(Get('url') + "headers").replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));

    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
if (User == true) {
    var list = JSON.parse(result).results.list;
    for (i in list) {
        var authors = [];
        var authorElements = list[i].author || list[i].comic.author;
        for (var j in authorElements) {
            authors.push(String(authorElements[j].name));
        }
        author = authors.join('/').replace(/\s/g, '');
        kind = 'âœ¦ ' + Num(list[i].popular || list[i].comic.popular);
    var kinds1 = [];
    var kindElements1 = list[i].theme || list[i].comic.theme;
    for (var j in kindElements1) {
        kinds1.push(String(kindElements1[j].name));
    }
    kind1 = kinds1.join(',').replace(/\s/g, '');
        data.push({
            'name': list[i].name || list[i].comic.name,
            'author': author,
            'kind': kind + ',' + kind1 + ',' + (list[i].datetime_updated ? list[i].datetime_updated : ''),
            'word': '',
            'latest': '',
            'intro': '',
            'cover': list[i].cover || list[i].comic.cover,
            'url': Get('url') + '/api/v3/comic2/' + (list[i].path_word || list[i].comic.path_word)
        });
    }
    var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/offset=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'offset=' + ((parseInt(p1) + 24));}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
    if (!list[0] || !JSON.parse(next).results.list[0]) {
        Data();
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

        Data();
    }

} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);

ruleToc.nextTocUrl:

if(end == "0"){
    url = java.get("url");
    url;
}else{
    ""
}

searchUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
(function (e) {
    if (Get('search_TC') == true || e.indexOf('TC') > -1) {
        e = String(java.s2t(e)).replace(/TC/, '');
    }
    java.put(Get('url') + "searchkey", e);
    return Get('url') + '/api/v3/search/comic?q=' + e + '&limit=20&offset={{20*(page-1)}},{"headers":{"platform":"1"}}';
}(key));
</js>
